lead_paragraph: Lendl Simmons has been called up to the West Indies' World Twenty20 squad in place of the injured Andre Fletcher ahead of Thursday's semi-final against hosts India at Mumbai's Wankhede Stadium, tournament organisers said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Simmons Replaces Injured Fletcher in Windies T20 Squad
headline.main: Simmons Replaces Injured Fletcher in Windies T20 Squad

snippet: Lendl Simmons has been called up to the West Indies' World Twenty20 squad in place of the injured Andre Fletcher ahead of Thursday's semi-final against hosts India at Mumbai's Wankhede Stadium, tournament organisers said on Tuesday....
